EmailTemplate.description: BRH and EPIC Custom Database Quote
EmailTemplate.name: BRH - EPIC Custom Database Quote
EmailTemplate.subject: BRH and EPIC Custom Database Quote
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
For us to proceed with a tailored database, you must accept the pricing.
The annual cost is $17,005 (JEPPESEN) per year. $14,415 (LIDO) per year $16,309 (NavBlue) per year
If Data supplier does tailoring then only Honeywell Base Customer pricing applies.
If Honeywell does tailoring it is Base customer pricing in addition to the below event charges. Initial set up will include 25 events FOC.
TAILORED DATA FEE-ADD (per event) $1,045 TAILORED DATABASE FEE-CHANGE (per event) $522 TAILORED MAINT FEE PER IDENT (annual) $4738 TAILORED WAYPOINTS $21
Kind Regards,
Navigational Database Team 602-436-6738 option 3 HONEYWELL
